thread.title: Love & The Machine welcomes Dan Capuli as Creative / Design Director

author: cnbc.com
title: Love & The Machine welcomes Dan Capuli as Creative / Design Director
text:
CHICAGO, Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Love & The Machine has welcomed Dan Capuli as partner / creative director. Capuli previously served as a creative consultant for the agency on the Sur PhytoPerformance business. In the new role, Capuli will partner with founder / creative director Dave Kuhl and lead work across the agency portfolio. Click here for more information on the partners' backgrounds.
Capuli has over 20 years of experience in the industry, serving as VP Creative Director at Leo Burnett / Arc and Executive Design Director at Integer. He also ran two of his own design boutiques. He's had an award-winning career working on a diverse array of clients including Target, Coca Cola and MillerCoors.
"Dan is a true visionary," says Kuhl. "He brings his unique form of magic to every project that he touches. He can capture the heart of a brand and bring it to life in so many beautiful ways, but always centered on creating meaningful interactions and a strategically smart product. He's a one-of-a-kind creative thinker."
"I want to build things that last," says Capuli. "Our strongest differentiator is the commitment to building emotional connections for brands. That's why I love our name and why I love what we do."
Capuli recently helped Love & The Machine win an RFP shootout to partner with Grainful, the Ithaca, NY-based frozen entr√©e company, on their rebranding.
"It's been incredible working with Love & The Machine," says Grainful marketing manager Katie Long. "They're passionate, hardworking, fun, detail-oriented, and all-around great partners. Their ability to consistently deliver brilliant creative never ceases to amaze me. They're masterminds."
Grainful's new branding and design created by Love & The Machine will debut in March. www.loveandthemachine.com
